amendatorysection.catchline: Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act; applicability.
amendatorysection.para: The Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act shall apply to the enrollment option program as provided in this section. For purposes of the act, option students shall not be counted as formula students by the resident school district and shall be counted as formula students by the option school district.

crossreference.para: Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act, see section 79-1001.
